title: US Stig (Paul Gerrard)
description:
Paul Gerrard is a professional racing driver but you may know his work as the faceless driver "The Stig" from Top Gear America. He's here to talk about driving, common mistakes, plateuing, learning, improving, and his new book "The Optimum Drive." His book is available on Amazon, or from www.theoptimumdrive.com

 

Watch the show! https://youtu.be/AccvtQ8zqSc

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @theoptimumdrive

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @theoptimumdrive

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
